text: AcademicThemes package recolouring ggplot2 plots use colours different academic institutions. palettes accessed academic_colour_palette() function. arguments specified list colour palettes returned. want access just one colour palette can give name colour palette argument. example accessing colours Cancer Research UK logo.  access names palettes can use academic_colour_palette_names() function listed examples colours Colour Palettes article site. default return just colours palette, like use palette create palette different number colours can supply argument.
code: library(AcademicThemes) #> ==AcademicThemes================================ #> Please be mindful of the effects of your choice #> of colour palette on people who are colour blind #> ================================================  palettes <- academic_colour_palette() head(palettes) #> $ahrc #> [1] "#192B65" "#707FB1" "#9BA957" "#F3AB3E" #>  #> $bbsrc #> [1] "#293C91" "#C43089" "#E5B440" #>  #> $cgem_igc #> [1] "#0E2E5A" "#D22D48" #>  #> $cruk #> [1] "#2E0188" "#00B6EA" "#EE0286" #>  #> $eastbio #> [1] "#284E96" "#386C4D" "#E07E38" "#BB2D4A" #>  #> $epsrc #> [1] "#711D4B" "#459B8D" library(scales)  cruk_palette <- academic_colour_palette("cruk") cruk_palette #> [1] "#2E0188" "#00B6EA" "#EE0286"  show_col(cruk_palette) cruk_palette_9 <- academic_colour_palette("cruk", n = 9) cruk_palette_9 #> [1] "#2E0188" "#222EA0" "#175BB9" "#0B88D1" "#00B6EA" "#3B89D1" "#775CB8" #> [8] "#B22F9F" "#EE0286"  show_col(cruk_palette_9)

However, new entry must follow certain form. example entry Center Genomic Experimental Medicine (CGEM): cgem_igc name palette. institute normally shortened CGEM many institutions shortened thing. Therefore, igc put end name also part Institute Genetics Cancer. makes cgem_igc much descriptive unique palette name. c("#0e2e5a", "#b62641") description palette . two colours CGEM logo stored HEX.  HEX codes stored string starting hashtag (#) followed six characters either numbers 0-9 letters -F. don’t write colours valid HEX addition fail package tested result palette added package. addition, palette added alphabetical order name colour palette list. submit pull request palette added AcademicThemes, couple things can make process easier. added new palette can check works running return vector colours input. can rebuild documentation running Finally, can run package tests result tests passing. don’t pass, check error message, make sure new colour palette written valid HEX make sure put right place alphabetically list. like recognised contribution can also add official contributor. open file DESCRIPTION find lines read like add , add another entry vector authors like Notice couple things. Firstly, vector, add new entry put comma previous entry (easily forgotten). Secondly, supply email address people contacting package maintenance. Thirdly, role changed role = c("aut", "cre") role = c("ctb"), means recognised contributor package (author creator). Finally, don’t add ORCID ID don’t one, can left blank. reading , thank using contributing AcademicThemes.
